Summary: I was driving in a car with friends when I saw 5 or 6 amber colored lights shaped in a V formation.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Eden
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy friends and I were driving along a country road when we saw amber colored lights in a V shape flying just above the tree tops. There was no sound. We pulled over to the side of the raod to get a better look and the lights seemed to morph into a passenger plane. The object became a matte silver color.and disappeared
